verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: will] meet at a luxury resort on Sentosa Island for nuclear talks next week in Singapore , the White Hou

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARGM-LOC: at a luxury resort on Sentosa Island] [ARGM-PRP: for nuclear talks next week in Singapore] , [C-ARG1: the] White Hou
